sqlMap.statement: SELECT C.DS_DEF_SHIP_TO_CD ,E.SVC_BR_CD FROM BILL_TO_CUST A ,DS_CUST_TRX_RULE C ,SHIP_TO_CUST D ,SVC_BR_POST_XREF E WHERE A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND A.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND A.BILL_TO_CUST_CD = #billToCustCd# AND A.GLBL_CMPY_CD = C.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND A.SELL_TO_CUST_CD = C.DS_ACCT_NUM AND C.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND C.GLBL_CMPY_CD = D.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND C.DS_DEF_SHIP_TO_CD = D.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD AND D.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND D.GLBL_CMPY_CD = E.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND D.POST_CD = E.POST_CD(+) AND E.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0'
